title: [K-12] Online Language Learning Design Workshop Based on Universal Design for Learning (UDL) for Adult Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and fundamental digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Enhancing practical online learning design capabilities applicable in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design a one-week online language learning module according to Universal Design for Learning principles (structure, content, interaction)
Learners can develop 3+ real-life-based language learning activities (including certification assessments) accessible in smartphone environments
Learners can create an online learning roadmap with clear learning objectives and weekly workload distribution

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
